title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Join Our Team as an Insurance Specialist

Position Overview:
As an Insurance Specialist, you will be a vital member of our team, working closely with Relationship Managers to provide expert guidance on protection plans and insurance products to our valued clients. title: Senior / Staff Nurse (3 Rotating Shifts)
description:
About Us: People360 is Singapore's leading healthcare recruitment agency that supports healthcare professionals in improving their lives through Singapore and global career opportunities.

Position Overview: Our client is a well-established private hospital seeking experienced and compassionate Senior/Staff Nurses to become part of our team in various departments, including ICU, A&E, Med-Surg, and Inpatient Suites. They are offering Bonuses and Benefits for qualified candidates!

Key Responsibilities:
The role of a Specialty nurse may vary depending on their area of expertise, but some common responsibilities may include:

Assessing patient conditions: Specialty nurses are responsible for assessing the health and medical needs of their patients. This includes monitoring vital signs, performing physical assessments, and reviewing medical histories.
Developing care plans: Based on the assessment, specialty nurses develop individualized care plans for their patients. This involves setting goals, establishing interventions, and evaluating outcomes.
Administering medications and treatments: Specialty nurses administer medications and treatments, such as intravenous therapy or wound care, as prescribed by physicians or nurse practitioners.
Collaborating with healthcare teams: Specialty nurses work with other healthcare professionals, such as physicians, therapists, and social workers, to provide comprehensive care to their patients.

Qualifications:

Valid and current SNB license.
Minimum of 1 years of nursing experience preferred.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic healthcare environment.
Attention to detail and excellent problem-solving abilities.
Commitment to providing patient-centered care.

Shifts:

This position requires working in 3 rotating shifts, including days, evenings, and nights. Flexibility in scheduling is essential.

Benefits:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
5 day work week.
Join on bonus for applicable departments.

Assessing patient conditions: Specialty nurses are responsible for assessing the health and medical needs of their patients. This includes monitoring vital signs, performing physical assessments, and reviewing medical histories.
Developing care plans: Based on the assessment, specialty nurses develop individualized care plans for their patients. This involves setting goals, establishing interventions, and evaluating outcomes.
Administering medications and treatments: Specialty nurses administer medications and treatments, such as intravenous therapy or wound care, as prescribed by physicians or nurse practitioners.
Collaborating with healthcare teams: Specialty nurses work with other healthcare professionals, such as physicians, therapists, and social workers, to provide comprehensive care to their patients.

title: Electrical Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

Take charge of all aspects of electrical engineering in the design of electrical power distribution system, switchboard, MCC and control

·        Develop & review electrical related drawings, e.g. Single Line Diagram, MCC Schematic, Equipment layout, Cable ladder/tray routing layout
·        Knowledge in Onshore/ Offshore standards (IEC, NEMA, IEEE & API)
·        Prepare Electrical Load Analysis & List
·        Familiar with Short-Circuit and Voltage Drop calculation
·        Prepare & review Electrical MTO for projects
·        Review Electrical equipment’s datasheet
·        Strong knowledge in Low voltage MCC/Switchgear, UPS, VSD/VFD & Transformers
·        Prepare specification for LV Switchgear, MCC, Transformers & VSD/VFD’s

Reviewing of customers' specifications and drawings
Define specifications and scope of work to contractors
Execution of projects.
Startup, testing, commissioning and troubleshooting of plants.
Develop engineering capabilities and work with sales team on project proposal and bidding

Requirements:

Degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent recognized by Professional Engineers Board (PEB) Singapore
Able to read & understand line diagram and generate Bill of Materials from single line diagram
Knowledge on control, schematics, motor controls and materials take-off
Proficient in AutoCAD, Microsoft Office
Knowledge in Mitsubishi / Siemens / Schneider / Omron PLC software would be an added advantage
Able to take on numerous challenging tasks while simultaneously meeting high standards and deadlines / vision
Able to communicate effectively in English at all levels, both verbally and in written reports

An attractive remuneration package, benefits and challenging working environment and excellent career growth in the company would be offered to the successful candidate. We regret only shortlisted candidate will be notified.

title: Project Coordinator (Innovation & Technology)
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

National Gallery Singapore is a leading visual arts institution which oversees the world’s largest public collection of Singapore and Southeast Asian modern art. Situated at the birthplace of modern Singapore, in the heart of the Civic District, the Gallery is housed in two national monuments - City Hall and former Supreme Court - that have been beautifully restored and transformed into this exciting 64,000 square metre venue. Reflecting Singapore’s unique heritage and geographical location, the Gallery aims to be a progressive museum that creates dialogues between the art of Singapore, Southeast Asia and the world to foster and inspire a creative and inclusive society. This is reflected in our collaborative research, education, long-term and special exhibitions, and innovative programming. The Gallery also works with international museums such as Centre Pompidou, Musée d'Orsay, Tate Britain, National Museum of Modern Art, Tokyo (MOMAT) and National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art, Korea (MMCA), to jointly present Southeast Asian art in the global context, positioning Singapore as a key node in the global visual arts scene.
In 2020, the Gallery was the only museum in Southeast Asia that received a ranking in The Art Newspaper’s annual global survey of attendance at art museums, taking 20th place. In 2018, the Gallery was also the first museum in Asia to receive the Children in Museums Award by the European Museum Academy and Hands On! International Association of Children in Museums. It also won the awards for “Best Theme Attraction” at TTG Travel Awards 2017, “Best Attraction Experience”, “Breakthrough Contribution to Tourism” and “Best Customer Service (Attractions)” at the prestigious Singapore Tourism Awards in 2016 for its role in adding to the vibrancy of Singapore’s tourism landscape.
We offer job opportunities in our dynamic organisation. Working at the Gallery enhances and cultivates your love for the arts, and offers you a chance to be part of the Gallery's vision.
OUR PEOPLE
At National Gallery Singapore, we develop cultural leaders who make the world better. Our people are united by a shared belief in the power and necessity of art, and work together to create meaningful experiences for our visitors.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Collaborate with IT project managers to understand project requirements and identify procurement needs.
Support the procurement activities for Digital Delivery team, while also extending secondary support to other teams within Innovation & Technology.
Research and source for potential vendors, obtaining quotes, and conducting evaluations based on project criteria.
Coordinate vendor meetings and demonstrations, ensuring alignment with project objectives.
Support the IT Project Manager in reviewing vendor contracts and ensuring compliance with organizational policies and legal requirements.
Raise awareness and equip team on finance and procurement knowledge through divisional workshops and engagements. Train and guide department users in procurement with end–to–end solutions based on established guidelines and procedures.
Maintain a comprehensive database of vendor contracts, renewals, and terms.
Collaborate with the Finance Department to track project-related expenses, ensuring adherence to budgetary guidelines.
Track budget utilisation and provide regular reporting on expenses
Support IT Managers in organizing project meetings, preparing agendas, and minutes taking.
Contribute to the testing and quality assurance processes, verifying that delivered products meet the project's specifications and standards.
Provide business analysis and application support for smaller projects.

QUALIFICATIONS
Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/ Business Administration/ Information Technology or equivalent.
Minimum 2 years of relevant working experience.
Previous experience in procurement coordination, vendor management, or project administration is preferred.
Familiarity with IT hardware, software, and services procurement processes.
Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines effectively.
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities to collaborate with vendors, internal teams, and stakeholders.
Proficient in using productivity tools such as spreadsheets, project management software, and collaboration platforms.
Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on accuracy and thoroughness in all tasks.
Ability to adapt to changing priorities and maintain composure under pressure.
A passion for arts and culture or technology and a desire to contribute to the success of innovative digital projects is preferred.
Keen to learn about project management practice controls such as timeline, scope and budget tracking.



    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - National Gallery Singapore

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Job Requirements: 
Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

title: Associate, Financial Advisory (Restructuring & Insolvency)
description:
The Restructuring and Insolvency Associate conducts initial market research and financial analyses. He/She participates in business development and stakeholder interactions and manages the restructuring and insolvency processes for the client engagements that he/she is responsible for. Adherence to standards of ethics and maintain quality assurance in processes is expected of the role.
Key Roles & Responsibilities:

Analyse historical financial performance and perform cash flows analyses
Conduct financial analyses, financial statements review and assess business performance
Gather relevant data and information to develop financial restructuring plans
Prepare documents for sales of distressed assets
Research and gather information on legal entity structure of clients
Assist in drafting correspondence to clients with creditors during restructuring or insolvency
Support team with judicial management, receiverships and liquidations
Gather relevant data and information to develop a proposal and/or scheme of arrangement
Maintain internal and external relationships to drive desired outcomes
Prepare business proposals and pitch documents

Job Requirements:

Background in Accounting, Business, Economics, Finance or other relevant field
Experience in corporate insolvency and restructuring would be preferred, but candidates with no experience are also welcome to apply!
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, generate insights and construct solutions
Tenacious and willing to learn on the job
Able to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple deadlines
Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office Suite, specifically, Excel, PowerPoint and Word
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Strong team player

Job Description: 
Analyse historical financial performance and perform cash flows analyses
Conduct financial analyses, financial statements review and assess business performance
Gather relevant data and information to develop financial restructuring plans

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Conducts assessment, develop care plan, perform clinical procedures, monitor conditions and perform re-assessment;
Match/link clients to the appropriate services;
Assess training needs and provide training
Assist with the development and Manage On-Boarding Programme for new staff
Supervise junior staff and assist Center Manager with staff management
Any other tasks assigned by the Centre Manager.

Job Requirements: 
Minimum Diploma in Nursing with at least 3 years of Nursing experience.
Must be registered with Singapore Nursing Board.

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us

title: Health Attendant -(PHNNH)
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Peacehaven Nursing Home provides compassionate, individualized, holistic care to all without discrimination. We offer a comprehensive gamut of services to care for the sick, frail and elderly who have physical or mental disabilities with minimal or no appropriate caregiver support at home.
The Home has 14 separate Resident Living Areas (RLAs), each designed as an individual home-like environment. Hope RLA is specially designed to meet the needs of relatively independent residents with dementia. Peacehaven Nursing Home has also been awarded the bizSAFE level 3 status which affirms our commitment to safety and health standards at the workplace.
The Salvation Army, Singapore - Peacehaven Nursing Home

RESPONSIBILITIES

About the Job The Health Attendant will be responsible for assisting residents or clients in the aspects of Hygiene, Healthcare, Housekeeping and Exercises within Peacehaven Nursing Home.
Key Responsibilities

Support and assist the Nursing staff in providing the residents with basic hygiene and personal care on a daily basis


Escort the residents to and from hospital/clinic visits whenever necessary


Maintain cleanliness and tidiness of resident’s environment e.g. tidiness of patient’s beds, lockers and laundry/linens


Assist in serving of meals / drinks and in the feeding of the residents


Assist in recreational and social programmes for residents involved


Report any changes in behaviour or general conditions. Make general observations of residents’ physical condition and report any changes or deterioration to the attending nurses


QUALIFICATIONS
Minimum a Caregiver Certificate, Nursing Aide Certificate or Midwifery Certificate
Preferable at least 6 months relevant working experience in caring for the elderly 
Able to read, speak and write in English
Any specific requirements specified by Ministry of Health from time to time
Dynamic and good team player
Good interpersonal and communication skills

OTHER INFORMATION
Working Hours
44 working hours per week (1 days off per week according to roster)
Shift duty according to the nursing roster
Meal break: 30 minutes
Tea break: 15 minutes
 
Work Location
The Salvation Army – Peacehaven Nursing Home
9 Upper Changi Road North Singapore 507706

title: Family Office Investment Research Analyst
description:
Job Overview: Our client is seeking a skilled Investment Research Analyst to join their family office based in Singapore. As an Investment Research Analyst, you will play a crucial role in assisting with investment decision-making by conducting thorough market research, financial analysis, and due diligence. You will work closely with the team to provide comprehensive investment recommendations and contribute to the achievement of the family office's financial objectives.
Key Responsibilities:

Conduct in-depth research and analysis on potential investment opportunities across various asset classes, including equities, fixed income, real estate, private equity, and alternative investments.
Evaluate and analyse financial statements, company performance, industry trends, and macroeconomic factors to identify investment prospects and risks.
Prepare detailed investment reports, investment memos, and presentations to present findings and recommendations to senior management and investment committees.
Monitor and track existing investments, including performance analysis and regular updates on market conditions, industry dynamics, and regulatory changes.
Assist in portfolio management activities, including asset allocation, risk assessment, and performance evaluation.
Stay updated on industry developments, regulatory changes, and best practices in investment research and analysis.

Key Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in finance or CFA qualifications.
Must be able to work legally in Singapore.
Bilingual in English and Mandarin for handling Mandarin speaking clients.
Strong financial analysis skills with a deep understanding of investment valuation techniques, financial modelling, and quantitative analysis.
Proficiency in utilizing financial databases, research tools, and software (e.g., Bloomberg, FactSet, Morningstar, Excel, PowerPoint) to gather and analyse investment data.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills to prepare comprehensive investment reports and effectively communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders.
Professionalism, integrity, and a strong work ethic to uphold confidentiality and high ethical standards in handling sensitive financial information.

title: Recruitment Consultant
description:
About Tech Grid Asia
Tech Grid Asia is an innovative IT software development company founded in Singapore that specializes in providing Digital Strategy Consulting and Technology Solutions services. Our team of professionals is experienced in creating and implementing custom software solutions to elevate your business to the next level.
In addition to our software development expertise, Tech Grid Asia also offers Technology Recruitment Consultancy services. We specialize in permanent, contract, staffing, and payroll solutions to help clients find the perfect fit for their organization.
We are expanding rapidly and looking for like-minded, driven people to join us!
Job Summary:
This role kick-start your career in a highly rewarding and highly satisfying environment.
You will be trained to engage with job seekers effectively and to understand employers’ business & hiring needs. You will be required to manage and ensure a successful and good process of job-seeking experience and be exposed to candidates and clients from various industries and job functions. You will be working closely and learning the art of recruitment from the Team Leaders/Managers.
Responsibilities:

Doing the 360-degree practice of recruitment including attracting clients and candidates
Developing relationships, managing active communication with clients
Pre-screening the candidate’s CV, assessing the candidate’s potential interview and preparing to forward the candidate’s profile to clients
Managing the end-to-end process from coordinating with the client to the candidate’s start date
Developing and maintaining relations with the HR team/recruiting channel partners
Always keeping in contact with clients to get feedback from candidates
Focused, self-motivated and confident individual who possesses strong customer service, sales experience and multi-tasking skills
Achieves sales target
Preparing wage schedules, employment conditions, compensation and benefits for employment approval

Requirements:

Great negotiation skills
Good command of English
Passionate in a sales-driven / target-driven working environment
Sociable, outgoing and hustler personality, enjoys meeting new people daily
Eager and passionate in a recruitment consultancy environment where you will always learn new and different things from time to time

Why Join Us?:

Competitive compensation package
Comfortable and conducive working environment
Attractive Paid Leave Package with additional Birthday & Anniversary Leave
Professional Development Opportunities
Career Progression

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Job Description: 
Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Working with leading-edge Contactless Smart Card technology, your key challenge is to spearhead the evolution of Automatic Fare Collection (AFC) equipment. Your job includes requirements gathering, design and development of multiple public transport e-payment devices. Typical devices include bus fare collection devices and rail fare collection gates. You must investigate reported issues and improve individual AFC device software and the overall AFC system. Additionally, you must support AFC software rollout and deployment in the production environment. You should be good at analysing problems and skilful in resolving issues about systems or software.

Job Responsibilities

Assessing Problems
    
Providing software application support, performing analyses on software application functionality, and suggesting improvements.
Monitoring effective front-end and back-end functionality of applications based on automated tools for performance metrics adherence.
Work with cross-functional teams in Infrastructure, Security and other teams to assess the problem effectively.


Identifying and Assessing Technological Solutions
    
Collaborate with the software development team, internal users, and clients to improve application performance.
Establishing the root causes of application errors and escalating serious concerns to the Senior Engineer.
Propose workaround solutions until the permanent fixes are deployed.


Maintaining Records and Writing Reports
    
Keeping a record of configuration changes and scheduling application updates.
Documenting processes and developing reports for customers across the business.


Support Role
    
Providing front-end support to clients and colleagues in other departments.
Develop knowledge articles for frequently occurring issues.


Software Enhancement
    
Perform L3 support, including Software development and maintenance in terms of implementing enhancements and defect fixes.
Maintain and improve the performance of existing software for the production environment


General Skills
    
Clearly and regularly communicate with management and technical support colleagues
Ability to own tasks and think critically during a crisis.
Willing to learn and collaborate with various stakeholders.



Requirements

Recognized Degree in Electrical/Electronics Engineering/Computer Science or a relevant discipline.
Experience in embedded software development and support with good working knowledge in object-oriented software development using C/C++/Java in Windows, QNX, Unix or Linux platforms.
Experience in software development involving

o web application development in Java, using Spring framework and interfacing with databases using JDBC and SQL.
o Object-oriented software design and UML modelling.

Good knowledge of Windows Server and proficient scripting skill in PowerShell is highly desirable.
Experience in Incident Management and ITIL process.
Conduct trend analysis and provide appropriate support and input to product teams.
Aggressively monitor and respond to incidents generated by stakeholders.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Resourceful and self-motivated team player.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English.
Data Analytics and Data Visualization skills will be an added advantage.
Added advantage if the candidate is familiar with one or more of the following technologies:

o JSON
o Angular
o JSP
o Javascript
o HTML


(RM)

title: IT Executive
description:
The Write Connection is a premier education company in Singapore. We are looking for an IT Executive to support the daily operations of our centres by joining our Internal Operations Team.
Job Responsibilities

Provide daily IT support for IT-related issues and requests. This includes hardware maintenance, software application, hardware upgrades, and system installation.
Manage/participate in new setup or upgrade of systems and monitor system utilisation.
Perform troubleshooting or provide alternatives to resolve cases that are raised across various centres.
Assist with IT projects from conceptualisation, planning, execution to completion.
Ensure the deadlines of IT deliverables are met with desired quality, and communicated to various departments.
Maintain records of IT hardware, software, inventory, service and IT related contracts and documentation.
Ensure compliance with IT security policies and regulations.
Perform problem management and troubleshooting of network operating issues, desktop applications, hardware cause identification and resolution.
Perform any other special projects as assigned.
Assist with other scopes under the internal operations department.

Job Requirements

Possess at least a Diploma in IT, Computer Science, or a related discipline.
Able to work efficiently to meet tight deadlines, organise time well, and work with minimum supervision.
Knowledge of Google Sheets, Google Forms, Google App Script, HTML/CSS, Apple systems and devices, and ECOS would be favourable.
Technically savvy and/or fast learner of technology.
Comfortable using the Mac platform.
Possess excellent communication skills to work with stakeholders and ensure that works meet requirements, and expected timelines.
Proficiency in spoken and written Mandarin is a plus as the work would involve collaboration with technical teams based in China

Work Hours and Location:

5 days work week: includes 4 weekdays and 1 weekend (which can be a Sat or Sun depending on roster)
Shifts: Weekdays: 12.30pm - 9.30pm , Weekends: 8.30am - 6.30pm
Work Location: TWC HQ, Guthrie House, Bukit Timah. (Candidate may be required to travel to various TWC centres)

Note to Applicant:

Only Singaporeans and PR need apply.
Send your CV to Recruitment@TheWriteConnection.com.sg

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

company_name: NATIONAL CANCER CENTRE OF SINGAPORE PTE LTD
title: Research Technologist
description:
We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join the Cancer Therapeutic Research Laboratory (CTRL) at the National Cancer Centre Singapore. 

The Research Technologst (RT) will be involved in assisting in day to day laboratory maintenance, experimental setup and tissue sample logistics. They will be trained in basic molecular biology techniques including DNA/RNA extraction, western blot and cell culture. They will also have the opportunity to be trained in single -cell and single nuclei processing using 10x Genomics workflow

Duties & Responsibilities:

Assist in laboratory maintenance

- Weekly top up of laboratory consumables
- Weekly refill of pipette tips for autoclave
- Weekly checking of liquid nitrogen tank
- Assist in cleaning of water bath and incubator water tray when needed
prepare reagent or buffers when required

Assist in tissue logistics

- Collection of patient samples (FFPE, Tissue, WBC,DNA or RNA) from Pathology
- DNA/RNA extraction from frozen tissue or FFPE (weekly)
- Submission of DNA/RNA samples to external sequencing partner

Assist in carrying 10x single cell sequencing experiment

- Provide assistance when researcher is running 10x single cell sequencing (one or twice a month)
- Processed sample should be of good quality before sending out for library preparation for scRNA/snRNA sequencing

Assist in cell culture 

- Help to change cell culture media when needed (cell culture, organoids)
- Contribute to Cell line and organoids biobanking efforts

Requirements:

Diploma in Biotechnology/Biomedical Science. 
Having had internship experience in diagnostic service or research laboratory is an advantage
Team player, strong collaborator
Meticulous, independent worker, possess initiative to complete tasks and projects assigned
Highly motivated to learn new techniques and not afraid to ask if unsure
Job Description:

Assist in laboratory maintenance

Job Requirements: 
Diploma in Biotechnology/Biomedical Science. 
Having had internship experience in diagnostic service or research laboratory is an advantage

title: Therapy Assistant (Centre of Excellence)
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

NTUC Health Co-operative Limited (NTUC Health) is an NTUC social enterprise that provides a comprehensive and integrated suite of quality and affordable health and eldercare services to meet the growing needs of families and their dependents. Building on more than four decades of experience and expertise, NTUC Health is among the largest senior day care, nursing home and home personal care providers in Singapore. It also offers other services for seniors such as an active ageing hub, senior activity centres, community support for vulnerable seniors, and a sheltered / senior group home. In addition, it runs a chain of dental clinics, and a family medicine clinic

RESPONSIBILITIES

You will assist the Therapists in safe residents handling and care during treatments. Your responsibilities include ensuring the smooth operation of the department such as preparing treatment area, the resident, equipment and materials.
Assist Therapist in all activities of therapy treatment
Transport residents safely to and from treatment areas, secure them into or onto therapy equipment.
Instruct, motivate, safeguard and assist residents in practicing exercises and functional activities, under direction of Therapist or medical staff.
Observe patients during treatment to compile and evaluate data on patients' responses and progress, and report to Therapist for quality care improvement.
Ensure tidiness and cleanliness of therapy area and disinfect equipment after treatment.
Ensure adequate stock of resident supplies and expendables for the department

QUALIFICATIONS
Minimum WSQ Certificate / Advance Certificate in Therapy Services
Literate in English
Ability to speak a local dialect/language will be helpful
Possess basic computer skills

OTHER INFORMATION
*There are multiple locations for this position.

    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - NTUC Health

Instruct, motivate, safeguard and assist residents in practicing exercises and functional activities, under direction of Therapist or medical staff.

title: Business Analyst
description:
We're in search of a Business Analyst who will act as a crucial link between our company and our customers. Your role will entail a combination of analytical thinking and exceptional customer service to assist clients in diagnosing and resolving technical issues. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to create and implement plans for improving customer support and utilizing insights from support issues to influence future product designs and business processes.
We're seeking a natural problem-solver who enjoys assisting others and can easily explain technical details. As the guardian of our customers' trust, you'll be responsible for providing them with prompt and accurate solutions to their technical issues. If this sounds like you, we'd love to meet you!

Responsibilities

Provide the first level of support, work with and ask customers targeted questions to quickly understand and diagnose root cause of the issue, troubleshoot and/or escalate to the relevant teams.
Research and identify solutions to common issues; document and maintain a knowledge base for Frequently Asked Questions so that end-users can look up solutions independently.
Develop mitigating and/or preventive solutions to optimize efforts spent on customer support, including establishing problem solving guidelines, checklists, or other materials to improve response to recurring or routine user problems.
Generate summary reports; analyse and present support trends and patterns to inform business needs or technical requirements.

Qualifications:

Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in any field. Strong interest in working with computer applications and software.
Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills: even when you do not have the solution to the problem, you know how to get the solution; this includes the ability to know what questions to ask
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills: able to articulate effectively in writing and verbally
A quick learner and displays high willingness to learn
Attitude: possess determination and commitment to strive towards excellence in everything you do. No detective leaves a case unsolved.
Able to work independently and as a team: able to support multiple requests concurrently, able to multi-task and stay organized in a fast-paced environment.
Possess a keen interest to pursue a career in tech. Those without tech experience are welcome to apply, subject to certain job roles where some tech experience may be required.

Benefits

Opportunity to work with a high-value enterprise-level software that applies cutting edge AI-based optimization technology.
Hone your ability to apply analytical & technical skills apart from a pure customer service role.
Mentorship to manage internal and external stakeholders.
Diverse opportunity for career advancement

Develop mitigating and/or preventive solutions to optimize efforts spent on customer support, including establishing problem solving guidelines, checklists, or other materials to improve response to recurring or routine user problems.
Generate summary reports; analyse and present support trends and patterns to inform business needs or technical requirements.

Job Requirements:

title: Account Assistant
description:
Job description
About Poeme Labo Pte Ltd:
Poeme Labo Pte Ltd is a passionate startup company dedicated to restoring individuals' smiles and confidence at high-quality and affordable prices. Our mission is to perfect smiles while making clear aligner care accessible to everyone. With the company slogan, "The poetry of perfecting smiles," we are dedicated to transforming lives one smile at a time. We are excited to invite a proactive and versatile Account Assistant to join our team and help us make smiles brighter.

Job Summary:
As an Entry Level Account Assistant at Poeme Labo Pte Ltd, you will play a crucial role in supporting our finance and accounting operations. This role involves handling various accounting tasks, including bookkeeping, data entry, invoicing, payroll, and assisting with other ad-hoc duties within the company. If you have a passion for finance and seek to kickstart your career in accounting, we welcome you to join our dynamic team.

Key Responsibilities:

Perform bookkeeping tasks, ensuring accuracy and completeness of financial records.
Conduct data entry and maintain organized filing systems for financial documents.
Issue invoices and statements of accounts to clients promptly and accurately.
Tally and process all suppliers' invoices and facilitate payments in a timely manner.
Handle staff claims reimbursement and maintain relevant records.
Create payment vouchers for all purchases, seeking necessary approvals.
Assist in processing monthly payroll accurately and efficiently.
Update staff leave and medical welfare records in compliance with company policies.
Assist with ad-hoc duties within the intercompany operations as required.

Qualifications:

Entry level/fresh graduated are welcome to apply, training will be provided.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and record-keeping.
Basic understanding of bookkeeping principles and accounting processes.
Proficient in using accounting software and Microsoft Office applications (e.g., Excel, Word).
Excellent organizational and time management skills to meet deadlines effectively.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate within a team and interact with various stakeholders.

Preferred Skills:

Prior experience in bookkeeping or accounting is a plus.
Familiarity with accounting software such as Xero, or similar platforms.


We Offer:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity for growth and advancement within the organization.
Supportive and inclusive work environment.

If you are a dedicated and motivated individual seeking to embark on your accounting career with a cutting-edge startup specializing in clear aligners, we encourage you to apply and be part of our exciting journey at Poeme Labo Pte Ltd.

Interested? Don't hesitate – click the "Apply" button now!
We appreciate the interest of all applicants in Poeme Labo Pte Ltd; however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

$1,000 - $1,200/Month

title: HR Executive
description:
We are looking for a HR Executive who loves numbers as well as anything related to employees’ well beings. In this position, you will be working closely with our sales team to generate contracts and invoices for our clients. You will also be handling the account receivables and payables of the company, as well as supporting our HR functions.

Rewards:

Medical and insurance coverage
Yearly pay increment
Additional 2 days of annual leave every year
Work alongside with an award winning team (Winner of Search Marketing Agency Of The Year 2022 & Lead Generation Agency Of The Year 2022)
A super fun and dynamic company culture
Work from home / Report to office 2 days per week

Responsibilities:

Generating contracts and invoices for our clients
Monitoring of incoming payment
Sending payment reminders to our clients
Assisting with recruitment processes such as arranging and scheduling of interviews
Supporting onboarding and offboarding activities
Managing employee records as well as inventory matters
Answer clients' inquiries via email, live-chat, messages and calls
Updating company's CRM system
Administrative work

Requirements:

STRICTLY Singaporean or PR holder only
Meticulous nature
Strong passion in numbers
Fluent in written and spoken English
Ability to multi-task and meet strict deadlines
Possesses self-initiative, hardworking and responsible
Resourceful, cheerful disposition with a positive working attitude

Probation Period:
This position includes a 6 months probationary period to assess mutual compatibility within the job role.

Why Us:
Voted by Adidas, CapitaLand, Grab, Lazada, Alibaba, L’Oréal, Hilton, Zalora and UOB, we are the winner of Search Marketing Agency of the year 2022. We are also the winner of Lead Generation Agency of the year 2022.

With an ongoing expansion plan, we want to gather the best talents in Singapore and bring Impossible Marketing globally. This means that you get to work with some of the biggest brands in Singapore and Asia.

In addition, we are probably the only Digital Marketing Agency in Singapore that takes CSR seriously. We launched “Project KATE” back in 2015 and have since supported multiple charity organisations and the less fortunate for free.

More info: https://www.impossible.sg/

Monitoring of incoming payment
Sending payment reminders to our clients
Assisting with recruitment processes such as arranging and scheduling of interviews
Supporting onboarding and offboarding activities
Managing employee records as well as inventory matters
Answer clients' inquiries via email, live-chat, messages and calls
Updating company's CRM system
Administrative work

Meticulous nature

Ability to multi-task and meet strict deadlines

Resourceful, cheerful disposition with a positive working attitude

title: Warehouse Assistant (Logistic)
description:
Responsibilities:
You are responsible for the below warehouse operations.

Able to operate via handheld device.
Compile basic data reporting.
Verify & ensure the accuracy of all incoming & outgoing shipments.
Ensure accurate input of in/out stock in the company’s ERP system
Check & inform Operations Executive all returned items quality condition as per checklist.
Ensure all stock items are properly put back & well labelled to the storage area according to the planned floor plan.
Responsible for day-to-day picking, packing & barcoding before delivery according to the plan delivery schedule.
Ensure assigned warehouse areas are clean, neat & organized.
Responsible for the security of inventory in the assigned warehouse area.
Responsible for warehouse stock discrepancies / missing in the assigned warehouse area.
Any other tasks assigned by management.

Requirements:

Preferably with 1 year of related working experience in the warehouse.
Computer literate & knowledge of computerized inventory control  systems is an added advantage
5-day work week
Able to handle physical work to carry loads up to 20 kg.
Responsible, possess initiative, independent and resourceful.

Benefits: Salary + OT + AWS + Performance Bonus + Medical & Hospital Benefits + Staff purchase discount + Staff vouchers

description:

Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.

Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications

Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems

Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)

Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
