title: Service Engineer
description:
Job Descriptions

Plan and undertake scheduled preventive maintenance tasks at Clients' premises (ie. Enterprise Network, Server, Storage, UPS System, Environmental Monitoring System etc.)
Perform basic equipment break-fix during preventive maintenance windows when required
Coordinate and monitor work progress with customer and relevant parties for information to expedite installation and supervise sub-contractors' work at site.
Schedule purchases and deliveries of all materials for the project.
Provides basic support of installation, maintenance, and repair of systems and equipment.
Perform 24/7 standby duty for service calls on a rotational basis.

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work well at all levels

Possess strong analytical skills with positive attitude

title: StoreKeeper
description:
The Storekeeper is responsible for coordinating general warehouse operation and activities, such as receiving and shipping deliveries, doing stock inspections, documenting warehouse transaction and records, and inventory storage

Job Responsibilities

Loading, unloading, arranging and moving of warehouse cargo and items
Checking and inspecting received goods to ensure they are of the correct quantity, type, and quality
Packing, labelling, packaging, stocking, organising and re-arranging of product in the warehouse when received and before they are dispatched
 Comply with height, weight and special handling requirements in stacking, moving, and arranging items on pallets according to storage plans
Handle container stuffing and unstuffing operations and any necessary cargo/material handling security procedures
Perform cross docking operations, shipment consolidation, transshipment and transloading operations
Apply methods and techniques to manage dangerous goods and time and temperature sensitive cargo
 Any ad hoc duties as assigned by superior

Job Requirements

Meticulous and physically fit to carry heavy items
Able to work as a team player and independently
Possess the necessary licenses to operate the various MHEs
Possess the knowledge, skills and necessary licenses to operate MHEs - forklift, pallet truck, reach truck, VNA, stacker, scissors lift, etc (as required)

You will be responsible for assessing and managing communication and/or swallowing disorders in adults and children with craniofacial anomalies and velopharyngeal dysfunction. You are to contribute to the organisation’s efforts in providing quality patient care, delivering clinical education and engaging in research activities.

4. Have excellent spoken and written communication skills.
5. Ability to work independently as well as in a team.

title: Associate, Compliance and Advisory
description:
Job Highlights:

You will be part of a growing and dynamic team managing a portfolio of client companies listed on the Catalist Board of the Singapore Exchange.
Your primary responsibility will be to advise on regulatory compliance and good corporate governance for listed companies.
You will have the opportunity to work closely with Singapore’s leading businesses and be part of a firm supporting the growth and development of small-medium enterprises in the region.
Qualities to succeed in this role would include, being a team player and having an analytical and meticulous mindset as well as ability to work under tight timelines.

Our client is an established corporate finance house with a long-standing reputation. An expert in the small-medium enterprise space across various disciplines – IPOs, corporate advisory for listed companies, Catalist sponsorship, underwriting and share placement, fund raising, mergers and acquisition, equity research and fund management. They are currently one of the market leaders in terms of Catalist Sponsorship clients in Singapore with clients in various industries ranging from consumer services, technology, construction and F&B.
Job Responsibilities:

Provide support in managing a portfolio of client companies listed on the Catalist Board of the Singapore Exchange
Provide necessary advice for listed companies’ directors and management on continuing listing obligations and corporate governance matters
Maintain an excellent relationship with the regulators through close and regular dialogues to drive resolution of issues
Conduct compliance review of corporate actions carried out by clients, including shareholder circulars, public announcements and press releases
Drive regulatory applications/notifications to clients and stakeholders and addressing regulators’ queries and requests in a satisfactorily and timely manner
Carry out ad-hoc tasks/projects as requested by the immediate team leader
Prepare/maintain documentation, compliance papers for internal committee approvals and application/consultation letters to the SGX
Assist in providing training on relevant listing rules and regulatory matters to stakeholders
Monitor daily share price and media reports of clients

Job Requirements:

Degree in Accountancy/Business/Finance
Entry level are welcome to apply.
1 year of working experience as an external auditor in Big-4 audit firm are welcome to apply too.
Good understanding and analyzing financial statements.
Generate financial reports.
Self-motivated, responsible, meticulous, strong analytical ability and project management skills, able to work independently and a good team player
Able to communicate effectively with clients, regulators and other professionals such as lawyers, auditors, financial advisors and valuers

If you are shortlisted for the first round of screening, our Recruiter will contact you directly.
EA License No: 21C0571 | R23116853 (Roy Goh)

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: [DTL] Assistant Engineer, Rail Facilities Management
description:
Responsibilities:

Supervise the contractors in the maintenance of Civil Defence fixtures, cleaning service, refuse disposal, pest control, minor works and landscaping so as to ensure that the facilities and equipment are operated and maintained to meet the safety, reliability and availability standards of SBS Transit
Lead a team of technicians in providing building maintenance and repairs in supporting station operations
Supervise the contractors and ensure that they deliver the service according to the agreement
Participate in the investigation of major fault or failure of Building/Civil Structure or equipment
Assist in the developing and implementation of failure management and emergency response procedures and processes
Assist in conducting training of in-house staff and contractors
Plan, supervise, inspect, audit and certify works carried out by the contractors
Check and monitor that all proper practices (such as fault reporting, response to corrective maintenance, safety procedure, etc.) required by the Engineer are carried out by contractors
Inspect and audit contractors’ quality of works, level of manpower, spares, tools and equipment
Monitor performance of outsourced contractors to ensure conformance to quality and proper documentation
Perform Duty Officer duties in accordance with duty roster
Assist in the review of Work instruction process for continuous improvement and updating
Track logistic support in terms of spares, purchase requisition, claims settlement, liquidated damages, cost adjustments, administration of assets and budget, etc of the maintenance contractors and also support of his own team in building maintenance and repairs
Assist in field test and system implementation of modification works initiated internally or by LTA
Assist engineer in the investigation of incident, major fault or failure of building related facilities and services and develop preventive actions
Participate in utilities conservation initiatives
Supervise inhouse minor work technicians to carry out building minor works as instructed by superior

Requirements:

Possess a polytechnic Diploma in any M&E or Building Services Engineering discipline or equivalent
Preferably with some relevant experience in building and M&E services maintenance in a railway environment
Possess good communication skills, leadership skills and computer literate
Positive attitude
A team player, flexible and co-operative
Self-motivated and resourceful
Responsible and dependable
Ability to work after office hours for inspections and emergencies
Able to perform shift work
Must be able to differentiate colors for work purposes

description:
Job Responsibilities

Perform analytical testing accurately and efficiently and in accordance to Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).
Able to assess the impact to products based on monograph changes/updates/introduction.
Able to support regulatory submissions and queries.
Perform equipment verification and calibration in accordance to procedures.
Document all results in accordance to Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) requirements.
Ensure all quality records are attached and/or file as predetermined.
Write and review Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and On the Job Training (OJTs) for the laboratory.
Conduct Laboratory investigations.
Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of laboratory equipment where required.

Perform laboratory equipment verification and calibration in accordance to procedures where required.
Ensure all documentations and quality records are conducted in accordance to Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) requirements and that they are filed in accordance to existing policies.
Train fellow colleagues on written procedures and SOPs pertaining to equipment operation, analytical and microbiological test methods and general laboratory operation.
Perform review and approval of test results in the Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS).
Perform proactive trending of analytical results

Min Degree in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Food Science or any related course of studies 
A minimum of 1 year QC experience in the pharmaceutical industry.

Experience in using HPLC, GC and Data Integrity

title: Technical Support Engineer
description:
Your primary responsibility will be to provide technical support, troubleshooting, and maintenance services for our digital signage solutions. You will collaborate closely with clients, internal teams, and external vendors to address and resolve any issues related to hardware, software, connectivity, and content management systems. Your expertise and customer-centric approach will contribute to delivering exceptional service and maximizing client satisfaction.

Responsibilities:

Install, configure, and maintain digital signage hardware components, including displays, media players, network equipment, and related peripherals.
Conduct on-site visits to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues promptly and efficiently.
Provide remote technical support to clients via phone, email, or remote desktop tools.
Diagnose and resolve problems related to software applications, content management systems, and network connectivity.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement customized solutions to meet clients' specific requirements.
Perform regular system checks, updates, and maintenance to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
Train clients on the effective use of digital signage systems and provide ongoing user support.
Document support requests, solutions, and troubleshooting procedures for knowledge sharing and future reference.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in digital signage.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in providing technical support for digital signage systems or related technologies.
Strong knowledge of digital signage hardware, software, and content management systems.
Proficient in troubleshooting hardware and software issues and resolving them effectively.
Familiarity with networking principles and protocols (TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS).
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Exceptional customer service and communication skills, both written and verbal.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational and time management abilities.
Flexibility to work occasional evenings, weekends, or on-call shifts when required.

title: Junior Equity Sales
description:
About The Company
KGI Securities is a leading multi asset brokerage firm with presence across several countries in Asia and a pioneer member of the Securities & Derivatives, Trading and Clearing Member of Singapore Exchange, ICE Futures Singapore and ICE Clear Singapore.
We hold a Capital Markets Services Licence, is regulated by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) and is also an equal opportunity employer.
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Junior Equity Sales professional to join our team. The Junior Equity Sales professional will be responsible for supporting the Equity Sales team in generating revenue by developing new business and maintaining existing relationships with clients. The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of equity markets and products, as well as excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Key Responsibilities:

Assist the Equity Sales team in developing and executing sales strategies to generate new business and maintain existing client relationships.
Conduct market research to identify potential clients and market trends.
Assist in preparing presentations and pitches to clients.
Communicate with clients to understand their needs and provide relevant product and market information.
Assist in negotiating and closing deals with clients.
Collaborate with other teams such as Research, Trading, and Investment Banking to provide clients with a comprehensive service.
Maintain accurate records of all client interactions and transactions.
Keep up-to-date with industry news and market developments.

Qualifications and Skills:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, Economics or related field.
1-3 years of experience in Equity Sales or related field. (Fresh graduates are welcome.)
Strong understanding of equity markets and products.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks.
Strong work ethic and self-motivated.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other relevant software.

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: Health Care Assistant
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Since October 2011, Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large.
THKMC provides assistance to the various groups in our community through more than 60 programmes and services for the elderly and the sick, families, persons with disabilities, and children.  We help anyone in need with full respect to their race, colour, creed, language, culture and religion. We have more than 90 programmes and services, reaching out to more than 55,000 people in the community.
Together, as ONETHK – Empowering the Community.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Assist doctors and registered nurses in simple procedures
Documenting, monitoring and recording observations of residents and their vital signs and reporting changes in condition to the registered nurse
Supervise / assist residents in their daily needs (e.g. personal grooming and daily living activities)
Escort residents for medical appointments
Guide residents to participate in development and recreational programmes
Provide general supervision of residents

QUALIFICATIONS
No specific qualification required.
You will be considered for the position of Nursing Aide with at least a qualification in any of the following: 
NITEC in Community Care & Social Services;
NITEC in Nursing;
HMI Institute of Health Sciences’ Certificate in Healthcare Support
WSQ Certificate in nursing care-related courses and / or relevant work experience in nursing care

OTHER INFORMATION
Work Location: Eunos / Chai Chee / Sembawang
Work Hours: 5-day work-week; 8.30 am to 6.00 pm


    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Assist doctors and registered nurses in simple procedures
Documenting, monitoring and recording observations of residents and their vital signs and reporting changes in condition to the registered nurse
Supervise / assist residents in their daily needs (e.g. personal grooming and daily living activities)
Escort residents for medical appointments
Guide residents to participate in development and recreational programmes
Provide general supervision of residents

Job Requirements: 
NITEC in Community Care & Social Services;
NITEC in Nursing;
HMI Institute of Health Sciences’ Certificate in Healthcare Support
WSQ Certificate in nursing care-related courses and / or relevant work experience in nursing care

title: Marketing Reporting Analyst (6 Months' Contract)
description:
The Marketing Reporting Analyst analyzes and implements the annual rate increase and rate initiatives for UPS Domestic and Global services. He/She participates in market and competitive research for rate initiative strategies. He/She supports the supervisor to manage rate increase projects and determines financial impact of rate initiatives and other revenue enhancement projects.

Job Responsibilities

Evaluates marketplace trends to look for opportunities to increase profits.
Analyzes competitor rate strategies and compares competitor rates to ensure UPS is well positioned in the market.
Creates effective dashboard/reports for performance analysis and deep dives to get insights.
Coordinates with district teams on helping to streamline the existing reporting process.
Evaluates results of the implemented rate changes to determine the effectiveness of the initiative.
Prepares tool for sales to negotiate rates with customers.
Loads rates into internal systems.
Audits rates and zone charts to ensure accuracy.
Prepares internal and external communication materials to announce rate changes.
Assist with any ad-hoc projects and task.

Job Requirements

Possess a Bachelor’s degree in marketing, economics and finance or any relevant field of discipline.
Minimum 1 year of relevant experience performing in a similar capacity in marketing, pricing, market analytics or revenue management.
Excellent command of English communication skills (both oral and written) with the ability to converse effectively and able to work well with people of all levels.
Display exceptional analytical skills with high sensitivity to figures with problem-solving abilities.
Energetic self-starter with excellent learning agility, willingness to take on challenges and with the ability to manage multiple competing priorities within tight deadlines.
Ability to work independently with excellent interpersonal skill which includes conducting presentation to the top management.
Meticulous team player and possess a positive attitude towards a fast-paced environment.
Strong business acumen, attention to details and excellent planning, organizing, coordinating and follow up skills.
Demonstrated skills in Microsoft Office Suite (MS Excel, MS PowerPoint). Knowledge in Power Query, Power Pivot, Power BI and Power Automate will be a plus.
Candidates without experience but can demonstrate right skill sets and aptitude may be considered.
This is a 6 months' contractual role. Candidates need to possess the right to work in Singapore.

title: Accounting and Advisory Associate
Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

description:
Are you an aspiring professional seeking a rewarding career in the banking and financial industry? Look no further! Join our dynamic team and embark on a journey of growth and success.

Competitive Base Salary
No Experience: Starting at $3,500 with potential to earn up to $3,900

Uncapped Sales Incentives based on Quarterly Individual Sales Performance
Exceptional Career Advancement Prospects, encompassing both Sales and Non-Sales pathways, attainable within 2-3 years. Apply now to explore further details.

Comprehensive Support from the Bank, including access to a vast client database, assigned prospects/leads, regular market updates, and product training.

Your primary role will involve:

Offering Personal Wealth Management services by introducing and selling the Bank's Bancassurance (Insurance) product suite.

Providing tele-advisory services to mass market and retail banking clients over the phone and scheduling consultations. You will have access to any of the Bank's branches located island-wide.

Qualifications

A minimum of a Local Diploma or higher
Completion of the required 4-6 CMFAS modules before commencing employment

Availability to work 5.5 days per week (Monday to Friday and Saturday mornings)

title: Management Trainee
description:
Premier Hytemp is a global leader in the manufacture and supply of engineered metal solutions headquarters in UK with operations in UK, Singapore and Malaysia.
Our reputation is founded upon our engineered solutions to complex supply requirements, innovative processing of materials and our ability to consistently meet challenging lead times, all of which have been established over four decades.
Today, our ability to manufacture and manage materials and components across the whole supply chain of our diversified customers in Oil & Gas, Aerospace, Nuclear and Defence sectors is at the heart of our investment and growth programme.

Job Summary
As a management trainee, an employee will have to gain experience and knowledge required for getting promoted to managerial positions under the direction of managers with experience. As part of the job, he or she should have to perform several duties across various departments such as machine shop, heat treatment, welding, QA/QC, manufacturing, engineering etc. He or she would have to interact with several departments of the organization.

Primary Responsibilities:

Work with other managers to plan and direct the work of the organization
Help set work instructions and processes when being assigned to respective departments
Work in different departments to gain perspective, including sales, customer service, purchasing, engineering, production, quality, special processes or heat treatment, planning, etc
Attend periodic evaluations. Monitoring the progress of performance with the management and key trainers as per the requirement of the organization
Achieve the planned targets of the management training program in order to continue in the program
Setting objectives and performance goals with reporting manager and upper management
Work with and through management to develop and implement actions that protect company assets and profitability
Learns line and staff functions, operations, management viewpoints and company policies and practices that affect each phase of business
Observes experienced workers to acquire knowledge of methods, procedures, and standards required for performance of departmental duties
Receives training in functions and operations of related departments to facilitate subsequent transferability between departments and to provide greater promotional opportunities

Other Duties
While this job description is intended to be an accurate reflection of the requirements of the position, management reserves the right to add or remove duties when circumstances dictate.

Requirements and Qualifications


Well organized with strong written, verbal, analytical and presentation skills.
It is important for a management trainee to have good interpersonal skills as required to interact with all levels in the organization.
Should be a quick learner and have a desire to gain knowledge.
Fresh graduates with engineering degree (Mechanical/Material/Industrial) from recognized institutes are welcome too.

title: Wealth Relationship Manager
description:
Job Highlights

Monthly Start Up Salary of S$3000 ~ S$6000
Additional Monthly Commission
Additional Quarterly Bonus at least S$14,000 (UP to S$30k)
Proven Success System
One-To-One field experience and mentorship
Various Platforms with Training Provided for Cold Clients Acquisitions
In Summary, you will have Start up Salary, Quarterly Bonus and Commission and various other incentives from company, division and also within the team

Job Description

Work for long hours BUT underpaid? Fixed 5 days gruesome work days? Unappreciated by your boss? Or simply wished to have a change of environment?
IF you are highly motivated, LOVE to help others, driven and a believer of what you reap is what you sow, YOU are the one we are looking for!

YOU can effectively be earning what someone is earning for a month WITHIN a day!

What we offer YOU

Customized trainings and relevant certification awarded (M5, M9, M9A, HI)
Excellent opportunities for Career Advancement
Various leads generation platform provided
Annual up to 3 times overseas trips
Flexible working hours with work-life balance
Customized & Personalized for your Personal Growth
One-To-One field experience and mentorship towards realistic achievable Success
Additional Attractive Package for Experienced Individuals

Job Requirements

Minimum Full Certificate in GCE "A" Level OR International Baccalaureate (Private) Diploma qualification / Diploma awarded by a polytechnic in Singapore or equivalent and Bachelor Degree
21 years old and above (Regulatory Requirement)
Willingness to learn and adapt
Highly motivated, determined with integrity
Experienced individuals in Banking, wealth management & health products will be an advantage
No work experience required

Job type: Full Time
Interested Candidates are invited to apply online via APPLY NOW button. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted.




What makes us unique?

Independence
Be in-charge and control of your own destiny. The sky is the limit, you can be extremely successful and yet the ability to strike a balance to simply do what you want to do and accomplish in life. A career that can yield extreme satisfaction for helping the society and be rewarded handsomely for what you have done while having the fun and joy of your personal life.

Empower
We are a strong believer that success can be replicated through a working system, but having said so we advocates the importance of “walk-the-talk”; this means that through a one-to-one mentorship we will guide you the rope towards success and how it can be done, this flattens the entire learning curve.

Activities
The sad truth is that most will ask you to focus on meeting your friends and family members, while there’s nothing wrong about that but not everyone is comfortable of doing so and most prefers to meet a complete stranger. What we can offer to You is that you will be provided with various platforms that allows you to do so. With an uncapped activities and trainings provided, you will have your daily activities filled if you sole desired and that will essentially leads to success both in recognition and financially.

Appreciation
Your hardwork is not just compensated financially. You are joining a team where each success are celebrated and appreciated. Because your hardwork will be recognized by your clients whom you have helped, appreciated and celebrated by the team you are in, rewarded by the group you have joined and recognized by the company whom you worked with. The sheer amount of joy and fulfillment will brings about a true purpose for yourself.

title: 7777-Aircon Technician [installation | repairs | maintenance]
description:
Aircon Technician

Working Days: 5.5days
Working Hours: 8.30am - 5.30pm, 8.30am - 12.30pm
Salary : $1,800 - $4,000
Location: Office at Ubi , working location will be island wide  

Job Description

Carry out repair and routine maintenance duties on equipment, building facilities and offices, building systems, grounds, and structures
Coordinate efforts with company’s contracted HVAC vendors to ensure company HVAC systems are functioning perfectly
Perform inspection, maintenance, repairs, and installation of air conditioning systems, including D.D.C. building control and pneumatic systems, cooling systems, refrigerators, ice machine, refrigerated water coolers, and similar equipment
Carry out maintenance checks on heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems; clean evaporator drain pans, coils, and filters; lubricate fan and motor bearings; repair and change motors, electrical wiring, belts, compressors, thermostats, fans, floating elements, and defrost timers
Place airflow controls to occupants’ preference by adjusting dampers, splitter, diffusers, and fans speeds; take away, clean, and change filters and strainer; remake, repair, and paint metal and wood cooling fans and towers; add the right amount of chemicals to water towers to prevent corrosion and rust
Run equipment, observe its operation, and read instruments and gauges, including Volt-ohm meters; find out temperature gauges and adjust mechanisms, including valves, pumps and controls to direct levels of fluid, temperature, and pressure; charge with specified types and amount of refrigerant, and bleed contaminants from systems; inspect gauges and carry out periodic preventive maintenance checks
Carry out overhauling and servicing of refrigeration units by repairing, changing, or reworking broken parts of compressors, condensers, and vacuum pumps; inspect Freon level in refrigeration units and fix any leak observed, and charge units as required; clean and change filters on ice machines and similar equipment; inspect heating elements and change if bad

Relevant experiences

Perform inspection, maintenance, repairs, and installation of air conditioning systems, including D.D.C. building control and pneumatic systems, cooling systems, refrigerators, ice machine, refrigerated water coolers, and similar equipment
Carry out maintenance checks on heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems; clean evaporator drain pans, coils, and filters; lubricate fan and motor bearings; repair and change motors, electrical wiring, belts, compressors, thermostats, fans, floating elements, and defrost timers
Place airflow controls to occupants’ preference by adjusting dampers, splitter, diffusers, and fans speeds; take away, clean, and change filters and strainer; remake, repair, and paint metal and wood cooling fans and towers; add the right amount of chemicals to water towers to prevent corrosion and rust
Run equipment, observe its operation, and read instruments and gauges, including Volt-ohm meters; find out temperature gauges and adjust mechanisms, including valves, pumps and controls to direct levels of fluid, temperature, and pressure; charge with specified types and amount of refrigerant, and bleed contaminants from systems; inspect gauges and carry out periodic preventive maintenance checks
Carry out overhauling and servicing of refrigeration units by repairing, changing, or reworking broken parts of compressors, condensers, and vacuum pumps; inspect Freon level in refrigeration units and fix any leak observed, and charge units as required; clean and change filters on ice machines and similar equipment; inspect heating elements and change if bad

Job Requirements: 
Relevant experiences

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: Healthcare Assistant (St Andrew's Senior Care - Queenstown)
description:
Job Summary
Provide day care services to the clients attending the Day Care and Dementia Care Centre, by assisting in their personal care and activities of daily living to ensure comfort and safety of the individual in accordance with the standards of St. Andrew’s Senior Care, and maintaining a clean, orderly and safe environment for the clients and assisting the clients in personal care and activities of daily living.

Job Description

Porter clients (between drop-off point and centre, to and fro the gym for rehabilitation session).
Help clients settle down upon arrival at the centre.
See to the dietary needs of clients by serving meals to them and supervising their consumption.
Supervise and/or assist clients in the various activities
Assist clients who are require minimal supervision during toileting.
Assist clients to settle down for a nap after lunch.
Assist in the mobility of clients.
Porter clients to and from Rehabilitation sessions.
Conduct group programmes and activities for the clients under the supervision of the therapists.
Participate in inservice training programmes designed and catered for upgrading of the staff.
Be familiar with the fire evacuation route of the centre and safe management measures of the centre.
Maintain good housekeeping.
Carry out other duties as assigned from time to time.


Job Requirements

Minimum Secondary Education with Certificate in Healthcare Support
Candidates with no relevant experience will also be considered.

Working Hours

Monday to Friday / 42.5 hours per week (8.5 hours per day)

Working Location

11 Jalan Penjara, Singapore 149380

title: Audit Associate
description:
Job Description

Plan and carry out the external audit and other services in accordance with Singapore Standards of Auditing (“SSA”).
Perform audit engagements from planning to completion, monitoring the engagements progress against the planned budget and timing      set and agreed with the client.
Work as a team member by sharing responsibilities,      providing support, and maintaining communication with      colleagues/supervisors on a timely basis.
Document audit findings in accordance with SSA and communicate effectively to audit managers and partners.
Managing client relationships and have ability to achieve client satisfaction and retention.
Develop good problem-solving skills and provide sound recommendation of management actions based on industry research, insightful analysis, and investigation.
Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned.

Job Requirements

Diploma / Degree in accounting / finance or equivalent professional qualifications
Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience candidates will be considered for Audit Seniors
Minimal audit experience or entry level are welcome to apply for the Audit Associate position as comprehensive training would be provided.
Proactive, committed, and able to work under pressure.
Possess strong initiative to complete each assigned engagements / task.
Possess the ability to work cohesively and harmoniously as a team player.
Able to commit minimum 24 months to the firm, with an enhanced remuneration package.

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application

title: Integrated Circuit Designer
description:
StarFive is a leading provider of RISCV processors, platforms and solutions. StarFive products are widely used in smart home appliances, smart monitoring, industrial robots, traffic management, intelligent logistics, wearable devices, solid state storage, network communications and edge computing, etc.
We are intensively designing next generation high performance RISC-V CPU and RISC-V-based SoC chips. Talents who are passionate in research and development for future chips are welcomed to join us. Being part of this vibrant team, you can produce world class successful commercial chips supported by efficient software stacks.

Responsibilities:

Participate in the micro-architecture design and/or implementation of SoC subsystems such as multicore processors, cache, and interconnect
Work with senior architects to optimize the performance, power, and area of the SoC subsystems
Architectural modelling/simulation, performance analysis, and identifying bottlenecks
Maintain and automate the development environment

Qualification：

BS/MS/Phd in Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Computer Science or related fields.
Basic knowledge of computer architecture, such as CPU micro-architecture, multicore processing, network-on-chip, memory hierarchy
Competent in C/C++ coding skills, including OOP, Data Structures etc.
Familiar with basic software engineering skills
Experienced with version control systems like git/mercurial
Any of following skills is a plus


RTL design (Verilog/VHDL/Chisel)
Assembly language programming (x86/ARM/RISCV)
Scripting in python etc


Eagerness to learn, good communication and collaboration skills
Fresh Graduates are welcome
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Participate in the micro-architecture design and/or implementation of SoC subsystems such as multicore processors, cache, and interconnect
Work with senior architects to optimize the performance, power, and area of the SoC subsystems
Architectural modelling/simulation, performance analysis, and identifying bottlenecks
Maintain and automate the development environment

Job Requirements: 
BS/MS/Phd in Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Computer Science or related fields.
Basic knowledge of computer architecture, such as CPU micro-architecture, multicore processing, network-on-chip, memory hierarchy
Competent in C/C++ coding skills, including OOP, Data Structures etc.
Familiar with basic software engineering skills
Experienced with version control systems like git/mercurial
Any of following skills is a plus

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: Insurance Specialist (Banking) | CODE:GL
description:
Join Our Team as an Insurance Specialist

Position Overview:
As an Insurance Specialist, you will be a vital member of our team, working closely with Relationship Managers to provide expert guidance on protection plans and insurance products to our valued clients. Your role involves conducting training sessions for Relationship Managers, performing in-depth financial analyses, and tailoring personalized insurance solutions. Your commitment to delivering excellent customer service while ensuring strict regulatory compliance makes you an essential asset to our team.

Position Details:
Key Responsibilities:

Partner with Relationship Managers to provide protection plans and product advisory to clients.
Conduct product and insurance proposition training for Relationship Managers to enhance their product knowledge.
Perform comprehensive financial analysis for clients, customizing a set of products that align with their unique needs.
Offer product advisory services to clients, delivering an excellent customer service and banking experience.
Maintain rigorous compliance with all bank regulations and external regulatory authorities.

Qualifications:

A minimum of 2 years of insurance sales experience is preferred.
At least a Diploma or Degree qualification.

This is your opportunity to be a part of a team that provides expert insurance solutions and exceptional customer experiences. If you have the qualifications and drive to excel in this role, we encourage you to apply for the position of Insurance Specialist. Your expertise and dedication are valued assets that will help us achieve our mission of providing top-tier financial services to our clients.
Interested candidates can kindly apply via MyCareersFuture or drop your latest resume to gary.lua@justrecruit.com.sg

title: Senior Enrolled Nurse
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Since October 2011, Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large.
THKMC provides assistance to the various groups in our community through more than 60 programmes and services for the elderly and the sick, families, persons with disabilities, and children.  We help anyone in need with full respect to their race, colour, creed, language, culture and religion. We have more than 90 programmes and services, reaching out to more than 55,000 people in the community.
Together, as ONETHK – Empowering the Community.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Assist in clinical assessments and procedures to detect, manage, and meet our residents' physical, medical & psychosocial needs
Work closely with a dynamic multi-disciplinary team to provide co-ordinated and purposeful nursing care to meet rehabilitative and treatment needs of residents
Engage with residents, relatives & community partners in care planning discussions
Provide orientation, guidance, mentoring and coaching to new or less experienced nurses
Assist RNs in medication administration & management
Additional responsibilities as directed by RNs or management
Assist in residents' activities of daily living (ADL)

QUALIFICATIONS
NITEC in Nursing from ITE

OTHER INFORMATION
Ability to speak local languages and dialects will be an advantage
Active team player with strong initiative and good communication skills
Able to perform rotating shift
Night shift allowance: $20 per shift
Work location: Chai Chee / Eunos / Sembawang


    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Assist in clinical assessments and procedures to detect, manage, and meet our residents' physical, medical & psychosocial needs
Work closely with a dynamic multi-disciplinary team to provide co-ordinated and purposeful nursing care to meet rehabilitative and treatment needs of residents
Engage with residents, relatives & community partners in care planning discussions
Provide orientation, guidance, mentoring and coaching to new or less experienced nurses
Assist RNs in medication administration & management
Additional responsibilities as directed by RNs or management
Assist in residents' activities of daily living (ADL)

Job Requirements: 
NITEC in Nursing from ITE

title: Dental Surgery Assistant
description:
You will play an important part in ensuring our patients' comfort. To do that you will need to work together with your colleagues in the clinic, be meticulous to ensure treatment rooms are fully prepared (clean and stocked, equipment is sterilised, etc), and treat patients with empathy and care while working side by side with the dental surgeon in the treatment room.

We are looking for someone who is pro-active and willing to do whatever it takes to ensure the clinic runs smoothly. It's a 5-day work week, but you should also be willing to work on weekends and evenings.
If you think you'll be a good fit, we'd love to hear from you!

Things you need to do:

Assists the dentist during the dental treatment;
Maintains and ensures cleanliness of all dental equipments;
Ensures high standard of infection control;
Informs and assists to order the dental supplies when the supplies are low in stock;
Performs clinic reception duties such as keeping patients’ records and fixing appointments for the patients;
Handles telephone enquiries and bookings for the patients;
Arranges and informs the patients for appointments and remind them for follow-up treatments;
Performs any other duties that may be assigned to him/ her.

Things you need to have:

Minimum ‘N’/ ‘O’ Levels or equivalent
Good Communication and Interpersonal skills
Preferably able to speak Mandarin in order to liaise with and assist Mandarin-speaking patients accordingly
Willing to work on Weekends and evenings
Experience in dental industry will be advantageous, candidates with no experience are welcome to apply

Things we offer:

Annual Variable Bonus
Monthly Bonus
Loyalty Bonus
Birthday Off


*******************************
TOOFDOCTOR Dental Surgeons is a group of friendly and dynamic clinics who believe in providing evidence-based dentistry with a warm personal touch. We offer a full range of comprehensive dental services, providing general dentistry to specialist services for the whole family.
Our six clinics are conveniently located in Tanjong Pagar, Serangoon Central, Suntec, Pinnacle @ Duxton, Toa Payoh and Pelikat.

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
