title: Microbiologist
description:
Primary Function/Primary Goals/Objectives:

Develops and implements company and regulatory quality standards in Laboratory facility.
Knowledgeable of industry and governmental regulations affecting product quality.
Develops, implements, revises and maintains quality standards, tools and methods for processing materials into finished product s.
Designs or specifies inspection n and testing mechanisms and equipment.
Analyzes production limitations and standards.
Recommends revision of specifications when indicated.
Formulates or assists in formulating quality control policies and procedures.
Drives quality improvement and cost reduction using Six Sigma or Lean methodology.
Responsible for the implementation, maintenance and improvement of the laboratory quality management system and to identify the occurrence of departure from the quality management system and initiate actions to prevent or minimize such departures.

Major Responsibilities

Supervise all testing activities associated with batch release and environmental monitoring. Knowledge of basic principles, methods, technologies and practices of a professional/ technical field.
General knowledge of procedures and activities within own work area. Focused on learning the key aspects and duties of the job being performed. Applies research, information gathering and analytical skills.
Handles detailed, structured problems.
Works on assignments where judgment is required a majority of the time. Works under general direction, seeks assistance as needed.
Contributes to own team/ closely related teams through quality and accuracy of own output. Conveys information in a concise and professional manner.
Asks effective questions and solicits feedback to understand needs. Anticipates future needs based on past transactions.
Be an Approved Signatory to issue SAC endorsed report, to take responsibility for the validity and ensure adequacy of test result, design quality control programs, set action criteria and take corrective action when required.
Provide advice and guidance in technical matters, opinion and interpretation n based on results, and identify and resolve technical related problem.
Perform technical competency assessment for trainee.
Any other duties as assigned by supervisor.

Requirements ​

1 to 3 years of experience in microbiology laboratory testing or relevant experience or equivalent combination of education and work experience.
Good leadership and problem-solving skill.
Good communication and report writing skill.
Practical experience in working in a fast-pace laboratory environment with tight datelines and able to solve problems in a speedy and methodical manner with good follow -up on action items. Able to conduct effective laboratory investigations
Abilit y to lead and supervise a group of laboratories analysts to provide prompt service to support.
Production activities in a safe and productive environment.

title: Dealer: US Markets
description:
Job Description

Monitor order flow, order rejects and attend to client’s order related enquiries.
Work closely with operations and risk team to process liquidation orders.
Work closely with various stakeholders locally and from headquarters to investigate trade disputes.
Provide Order execution service for premium clients.
Pro-active engagement and build good rapport with key clients.
Perform outreach to prospects and dormant accounts to activate accounts.
Organize and host seminars /webinars/ presentation in the evening.
Build and develop partnership for client acquisition channels.
Participate in new product development, trading systems enhancement and other ad hoc projects.
Localize and ensure adherence to MAS requirements of all Markets/Financial Content on web and social media and relevant platforms.
Work closely with counterparties and back-room operations on account related, post trade settlement and corporate action matters.
Be aware of market developments, collate client feedback and market intelligence for monthly reporting to HOD.

Requirements

Diploma or Degree in any relevant discipline.
Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Certifications in CMFAS 1A, 5, 6, 6A will be advantageous
Good knowledge in equity markets and various trading systems.
Strong interpersonal skills, articulate, meticulous, team player, able to work under pressure.
Proficiency in MS office preferred.
Proficiency in English and Chinese, both written and spoken (in order to liaise with Chinese counterparts and clients).
Required to work on selected public holidays.
Able to work night to support US market.

title: Senior Care Associate (PHNNH)
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

The Salvation Army, Peacehaven Nursing Home provides compassionate, individualized, holistic care to all without discrimination. We offer a comprehensive gamut of services to care for the sick, frail and elderly who have physical or mental disabilities with minimal or no appropriate caregiver support at home.
The Home has 14 separate Resident Living Areas (RLAs), each designed as an individual home-like environment. Hope RLA is specially designed to meet the needs of relatively independent residents with dementia.
Peacehaven Nursing Home has also been awarded the bizSAFE level 3 status which affirms our commitment to safety and health standards at the workplace.
Web page: https://www.salvationarmy.org/singapore/peacehaven_nursing_home


RESPONSIBILITIES

The candidates will assist the clients on the following:

Individualised care programme.



Recreational, social and physical programme.



Personal care tasks which include assisting clients with bathing, feeding and personal grooming.


QUALIFICATIONS
GCE N or O-level
Job Requirements
Experience in Eldercare / Healthcare is an advantage
Applicants without experience, training will be provided
Must be authorised to work in Singapore

OTHER INFORMATION
Working Hours 
44 hours per week, working days according to Nursing roster. 
 
Working Location
The Salvation Army, Peacehaven Nursing Home
9 Upper Changi Road North Singapore 507706

    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - The Salvation Army Singapore

Individualised care programme.

Personal care tasks which include assisting clients with bathing, feeding and personal grooming.

title: Finance Executive
description:
We are looking for a Finance Executive who loves numbers as well as anything related to employees’ well beings. In this position, you will be working closely with our sales team to generate contracts and invoices for our clients. You will also be handling the account receivables and payables of the company, as well as supporting our HR functions.

Rewards:

Medical and insurance coverage
Yearly pay increment
Additional 2 days of annual leave every year
Work alongside with an award winning team (Winner of Search Marketing Agency Of The Year 2022 & Lead Generation Agency Of The Year 2022)
A super fun and dynamic company culture
Work from home / Report to office 2 days per week

Responsibilities:

Generating contracts and invoices for our clients
Monitoring of incoming payment
Sending payment reminders to our clients
Preparing monthly P&L report for our management team
Assisting with recruitment processes such as arranging and scheduling of interviews
Supporting onboarding and offboarding activities
Managing employee records as well as inventory matters
Answer clients' inquiries via email, live-chat, messages and calls
Updating company's CRM system
Administrative work

Requirements:

STRICTLY Singaporean or PR holder only
Meticulous nature
Strong passion in numbers
Fluent in written and spoken English
Ability to multi-task and meet strict deadlines
Possesses self-initiative, hardworking and responsible
Resourceful, cheerful disposition with a positive working attitude

Probation Period:
This position includes a 6 months probationary period to assess mutual compatibility within the job role.

Why Us:
Voted by Adidas, CapitaLand, Grab, Lazada, Alibaba, L’Oréal, Hilton, Zalora and UOB, we are the winner of Search Marketing Agency of the year 2022. We are also the winner of Lead Generation Agency of the year 2022.

With an ongoing expansion plan, we want to gather the best talents in Singapore and bring Impossible Marketing globally. This means that you get to work with some of the biggest brands in Singapore and Asia.

In addition, we are probably the only Digital Marketing Agency in Singapore that takes CSR seriously. We launched “Project KATE” back in 2015 and have since supported multiple charity organisations and the less fortunate for free.

More info: https://www.impossible.sg/

title: Audit Associate
description:
Job description
The audit associate will be involved in audit team and related assignments under the supervision of audit managers and partners, to ensure that these assignments are executed properly. The audit associate will be involved in the preparation and compilation of accounts for ACRA filing purpose. The audit associate is expected to work effectively in a team environment by sharing responsibilities, providing support and communicating with colleagues in a professional manner.

Job responsibilities

Assist in the planning, execution and finalisation of all areas of the audit assignment
Identify and raise potential risk issues with the manager / partner, while exercising judgement within agreed parameters.
Assist in the preparation of the income tax computations / returns and estimated tax provisions
Compilation of accounts for ACRA filing purposes
Maintain a full set of accounts using accounting software
Assist in other ad hoc tasks assigned by the partner or manager.

Job requirements

A degree in accounting or related field
Excellent analytical skills
Strong team working skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Possess initiative and able to work independently
Able to work effectively under pressure and in a fast paced environment.

title: 23659030 Compliance Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Risk Management Analyst 1
description:
Citi’s Global Legal Affairs and Compliance (GLAC) empowers and protects Citi by providing legal, compliance, investigative, and security services to our firm.  We manage compliance risk, provide legal analysis and advice, protect Citi’s people and businesses, advocate for legal and regulatory outcomes that benefit our firm and our clients, and ultimately promote behavior that is consistent with Citi’s mission and culture.

The Compliance Anti Money Laundering Risk Management Analyst is an entry level role responsible for assisting in establishing internal procedures to prevent money laundering and assist in all matters concerning financial crimes in coordination with the broader Anti-Money Laundering (AML) team. The overall objective is to resolve problems by identifying and selecting solutions through the application of acquired technical experience.

Responsibilities:

Apply in-depth specialty knowledge to complete tasks related to Know Your Client (KYC)
Aid in inquiries investigations
Participate in AML training offered through the business
Advise and assist business on requirements of the AML Program and Procedures as well as Russian AML laws
Ensure compliance and observance of all internal rules, regulations, instructions, and other bank standard acts by Unit employees
Resolve AML Compliance issues by selecting solutions from acquired technical experience and precedent
Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.

Qualifications:

Relevant experience required
Working knowledge of AML regulations and experience preferred
Proficient computer skills with a focus on Microsoft Office applications
Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication

Education:

Bachelor’s Degree/University degree or equivalent experience

This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed. Other job-related duties may be assigned as required.

title: Associate Data Scientist
description:
Department
The Predictive Analytics group transforms our data into state-of-the-art analytics to help clients make better decisions in the face of uncertainty. Our clients come from a wide range of industries such as banking, insurance, commercial real estate and many more. They use our economic research to evaluate credit-worthiness, to monitor risks and opportunities when weighing up major investment decisions as part of their corporate strategy. Our team is made up of intellectually curious economists, data scientists, and IT professionals who combine technical skills with a strong desire to understand clients’ needs.

Role
Our team is directly involved in the development of analytical solutions, including credit risk metrics, supply risk, interest rate risk, liquidity risk, ESG risk and integrated risk. Our data scientists contribute to projects in every phase, including data analysis, methodology design, model development and improvements, documentation writing, results delivery, and interpretation.

We are looking for a candidate to join our Predictive Analytics (PA) Operating Unit (OU) team to support research, customer success and business development in the APAC and Middle East region. As the expert in our analytical solutions, including credit risk, ESG and climate risk, you will represent Predictive Analytics’ risk modelling expertise in the region, working with teams across and outside of our OU as well as local sales team.
You will be involved in our research innovations and local client-facing activities that include technical aspects to maintain high level of value perceived in our products. These include planning and developing content for thought leadership, promoting our solutions in local webinars, events, research papers and case studies.

Responsibilities

Work with PA Research and Modelling team to design research innovations for a wide range of analytical solutions using innovative traditional and sophisticated machine learning methodologies.
Serve as the region’s subject matter expert for PA analytical solutions to develop positive relationship of advocacy and trust with local customers.
Deliver presentations for various internal and external audiences and write research papers and articles to demonstrate the value and application of our analytical solutions.
Follow modern methods of the intersection of ML, econometrics and statistics, and industry best practices for risk modelling.
Partner closely with sales teams on efforts related to client retention and expansion of business opportunities with existing customers.
Provide analytical support for product strategy decisions such as product localization efforts and data exploration for regional partnerships.


Qualifications

Validated expertise in leading risk model design using Machine Learning and/or econometric modeling techniques working with large datasets from multiple sources and vendors.
Advanced programming skills in R, Python and/or SAS.
Prior customer facing experience is preferred but not required
Proven ability to communicate technical content clearly and concisely to non-technical audiences
Strong academic background – A Ph.D., MS or Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Economics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Finance, or other relevant field
Proven track record to work in a collaborative team environment
Self-starter to build required content and with ability to supervise and train co-workers
Must be an intrinsically motivated, responsible person who can work well with others, able to operate relatively independently
Excellent writing, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
The successful candidate will also possess the following qualities: Adaptable, strong attention to detail, effective prioritization and time management

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

title: Junior Network Engineer
description:
We are seeking a motivated Junior Network Engineer to join our team. This role is ideal for individuals with a fundamental understanding of basic network communication who are eager to learn and grow in the field. As a Junior Network Engineer, you will work alongside experienced professionals, receive training, and have the opportunity to contribute to network setup, maintenance, and troubleshooting.

Responsibilities:

Assist in the installation, configuration, and maintenance of network devices and infrastructure.
Collaborate with senior engineers to troubleshoot network issues and implement solutions.
Monitor network performance and security, identifying potential vulnerabilities.
Participate in the documentation of network configurations, changes, and procedures.
Provide technical support to end-users and assist in resolving connectivity problems.
Learn and apply industry best practices for network design and maintenance.
Contribute to team efforts and projects as directed by senior engineers.

Requirements:

Basic understanding of networking concepts and protocols, including IP addressing, subnetting, and TCP/IP.
Strong problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn new technologies.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work well within a team.
High school diploma or equivalent; relevant certifications a plus.
Ability to work independently and take initiative.
Familiarity with network hardware, such as routers, switches, and firewalls.
Adaptability to a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

Assessment and Training:
Applicants will be required to pass a network communication test to demonstrate their basic knowledge. Successful candidates will proceed to an interview, during which further technical and situational questions will be asked. Training will be provided to selected candidates to enhance their skills and prepare them for the demands of the role.

Join our team and embark on a rewarding journey in the world of network engineering. We offer a supportive learning environment and the opportunity to build a solid foundation in networking technologies.
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Assist in the installation, configuration, and maintenance of network devices and infrastructure.
Collaborate with senior engineers to troubleshoot network issues and implement solutions.
Monitor network performance and security, identifying potential vulnerabilities.
Participate in the documentation of network configurations, changes, and procedures.
Provide technical support to end-users and assist in resolving connectivity problems.
Learn and apply industry best practices for network design and maintenance.
Contribute to team efforts and projects as directed by senior engineers.

Job Requirements: 
Basic understanding of networking concepts and protocols, including IP addressing, subnetting, and TCP/IP.
Strong problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn new technologies.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work well within a team.
High school diploma or equivalent; relevant certifications a plus.
Ability to work independently and take initiative.
Familiarity with network hardware, such as routers, switches, and firewalls.
Adaptability to a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

title: Enrolled Nurse
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Since October 2011, Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large.
THKMC provides assistance to the various groups in our community through more than 60 programmes and services for the elderly and the sick, families, persons with disabilities, and children.  We help anyone in need with full respect to their race, colour, creed, language, culture and religion. We have more than 90 programmes and services, reaching out to more than 55,000 people in the community.
Together, as ONETHK – Empowering the Community.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Assist in clinical assessments and procedures to detect, manage, and meet our residents’ physical, medical & psychosocial needs
Work closely with a dynamic multi-disciplinary team to provide co-ordinated and purposeful nursing care to meet rehabilitative and treatment needs of residents
Engage with residents, relatives & community partners in care planning discussions.
Provide orientation, guidance, mentoring and coaching to new or less experienced nurses
Assist RNs in medication administration & management
Additional responsibilities as directed by RNs or management
Assist in residents’ activities of daily living (ADL)

QUALIFICATIONS
NITEC in Nursing from ITE

OTHER INFORMATION
Ability to speak local languages and dialects will be an advantage
Active team player with strong initiative and good communication skills
Able to perform rotating shift
Work location: Chai Chee / Eunos


    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Assist in clinical assessments and procedures to detect, manage, and meet our residents’ physical, medical & psychosocial needs
Work closely with a dynamic multi-disciplinary team to provide co-ordinated and purposeful nursing care to meet rehabilitative and treatment needs of residents
Engage with residents, relatives & community partners in care planning discussions.
Provide orientation, guidance, mentoring and coaching to new or less experienced nurses
Assist RNs in medication administration & management
Additional responsibilities as directed by RNs or management
Assist in residents’ activities of daily living (ADL)

Job Requirements: 
NITEC in Nursing from ITE

title: AI & Optimization Solution Consultant
description:
We are looking for team members to join our fast-growing business as we solidify our market position.

Armed with an in-depth understanding of resource optimization capabilities of our flagship product Workforce Optimizer and excellent communication skills, as an AI & Optimization Solution Consultant, you will act as a trusted advisor for our enterprise clients on our resource management solutions. Involved in the end-to-end project delivery process, you will engage with the end users to explore new solutions and conceptualize prototypes. You can look forward to supporting our wide range of projects with large enterprises across Singapore, promising an unprecedented opportunity to learn and gain extensive experience.

Responsibilities:

Solutioning – Gather & analyze clients’ requirement with respect to the labour scheduling problem, understand their pain-points and translate them into conceptual design for the resource optimization solution
Project Delivery – Coordinate with our in-house AI & Optimization team who implement and configure our product to ensure timely project delivery
Education & Training – Educate end-users on best practices for resource optimization by conducting customer training workshops

Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field such as Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Industrial Management and Computer Science
Excellent verbal & written communication skills
Knowledge in building models and algorithms for statistics, mathematical programming, simulation or mathematical optimization using Operations Research, Constraint Programming or Heuristic Techniques
The following experience will be an added advantage:   

                -Experience in using well-known optimization engines like CPLEX
                -Experience with at least one scripting language such as Java, Python, C/C++
                -Experience in data modelling using SQL or Oracle

Benefits:

Opportunity to work with our exciting, cutting-edge flagship product Workforce Optimizer
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Solutioning – Gather & analyze clients’ requirement with respect to the labour scheduling problem, understand their pain-points and translate them into conceptual design for the resource optimization solution
Project Delivery – Coordinate with our in-house AI & Optimization team who implement and configure our product to ensure timely project delivery
Education & Training – Educate end-users on best practices for resource optimization by conducting customer training workshops

Job Requirements: 
Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field such as Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Industrial Management and Computer Science
Excellent verbal & written communication skills
Knowledge in building models and algorithms for statistics, mathematical programming, simulation or mathematical optimization using Operations Research, Constraint Programming or Heuristic Techniques

title: Technical Officer (Maintenance- Instrumentation & Control)
description:
Technical Officer (Maintenance- Instrumentation & Control)
West – Jurong Island, pick-up near Jurong East MRT Station
Responsibilities:

Carrying out Preventive and Corrective maintenance in accordance with maintenance plans and as work requests raised in the system.
Maintaining accurate and up-to-date records of all activities performed in the associated systems.
To perform all jobs in accordance to safe working practices followed in the plant.
Interact with Operation Staff on maintenance works.
To assist, supervise contractors assigned for specific works.
Contributing to the development of asset maintenance plans
To monitor and take appropriate action to maintain critical spares.
Assist in liaising with external agencies for all regulatory compliances.
Responding to emergencies in plant

Requirements:

Preferably Degree or Diploma in Electrical or Electronics Engineering or equivalent College degree may be waived if equivalent, extensive related experience can be demonstrated.
Skill sets required – through knowledge on types of process instruments, calibration of instruments/gauges, understanding of control/instrument drawings pneumatic/hydraulic circuits, computers, knowledge in PLC and DCS would be added advantage
At least 3 to 5 years of relevant experience in a similar capacity, within a Power plant or related Industries.
Self-motivated independent and has sound analytical and communication skills and is a team worker.
May be required to work beyond office hours & weekends.

Others:

Working location: Jurong Island
5-day work week
Company transport provided from Jurong East MRT

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application

title: ENTRY LEVEL SOFTWARE DEVELOPER - FRESH Grad
description:
Avensys is a reputed global IT professional services company headquartered in Singapore. Our service spectrum includes enterprise solution consulting, business intelligence, business process automation and managed services. Given our decade of success we have evolved to become one of the top trusted providers in Singapore and service a client base across banking and financial services, insurance, information technology, healthcare, retail, and supply chain.
We are currently looking to hire Software Developer. This is an exciting opportunity to expand your skill set, achieve job satisfaction and work-life balance.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Shortlisted candidates would be sent for exclusive training in particular technology.
On completion of classroom training, selected candidates will be placed on the software/application development team of our ongoing project at our MNC client, where they will receive On-The-Job Training (OJT) on various aspects of Software Development Life Cycle.

KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS

Experience writing code using languages such as (and not limited to) Java, pega.
Strong team player with professional mindset.
Able to work independently with minimal supervision.
Basics knowledge of Java would be advantageous.
Desire for a career in software applications.
Any programming projects would be an advantage.

REQUIREMENTS

Bachelor’s degree/ Diploma in information technology/Science /Computer Science/ Engineering or related technical area of study.
Have understanding about business application development like Java, pega etc.

title: Occupational Therapist / Senior Occupational Therapist
description:
As an Occupational Therapist, you will play a crucial role in the rehabilitation and well-being of our patients. Your primary responsibilities will include:

Responsibilities:

Assessment and Goal Setting: Assess patients effectively, establish appropriate treatment goals, and develop individualized treatment plans.
Therapy Implementation: Execute safe and effective therapy based on established treatment plans, ensuring patient comfort and well-being.
Reassessment and Modification: Continuously re-assess patients' progress and modify treatment plans as necessary to achieve the best outcomes.
Practice within Competence: Operate within your areas of professional competence and seek clinical support from supervisors and healthcare professionals when needed.
Team Collaboration: Communicate and work effectively as part of a team with referring doctors and other medical professionals to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Record Keeping: Ensure all patient records are accurately and promptly updated at all times, maintaining confidentiality and compliance with healthcare regulations.
Professional Development: Proactively engage in continuing professional development by self-study, attending continuing education presentations, participating in case discussions, and staying current with the latest research.
Clinical Education: Contribute to the clinical education of students and provide job training to therapy assistants.
Supervision: Supervise therapy assistants and support staff in the delivery of treatment to ensure high-quality care.

Benefits:

Competitive salary
Comprehensive healthcare benefits
Continuing education opportunities
Supportive and collaborative work environment
Professional growth and advancement potential

Requirements:

Must be Fully registered with Allied Health Professional Council (AHPC)
Recognised Diploma or Degree in Occupational Therapy
At least 1 year min experience as a Occupational Therapist or
Fresh graduates are welcomed to apply 

If you are a passionate Occupational Therapist looking to make a difference in the lives of patients and grow in your career, we invite you to "Click Apply".

title: HR Trainee  (Healthcare )  #HVN
description:
People are at the heart of great things at Recruit Express

The Role of a Recruiter

A Recruiter’s job is a hybrid role – it is not just about recruitment. It also encompasses business development, account management, marketing, customer service all rolled into one. It is about understanding people’s needs and motivations, and managing clients’ and candidates’ expectations. It is also about building relationships. A challenging role indeed, but a very meaningful one!

Responsibilities:

 Business Development: Initiate a range of business development and marketing activities to build new corporate clients and grow your own client portfolio.
 Account Management: Manage internal and external stakeholders and clients on their hiring needs.
 Talent Acquisition: Engage in candidate sourcing activities, such as publishing job advertisements and conducting candidate referrals, to ensure a consistent supply of candidates to meet client's needs.
 Candidate Management: Manage candidates’ job needs and expectations, their payroll and employment benefits.

Requirements:

 Minimum Degree in ANY Discipline
 Applicants with good track record in sports or other co-curricular activities in school will have an added advantage

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

title: Sales Engineer
description:
Job Summary
Direct Sales Engineers Position with Keyence Singapore is the premier opportunity for you to learn consultative, solution-based sales. At Keyence Singapore, sales professionals work in a highly professional and fast-paced office an average of two days a week, while three days a week they visit manufacturers in a sales territory so that they can consult face-to-face on solving customers’ critical quality control, reliability, and research or design applications. While Keyence products are highly technical, you will receive the training to become an expert on our products, solving applications, following our pro-active sales process, and conducting successful sales consultations.
Principal duties and tasks

Attend product and application training at Keyence Singapore Head Office in Singapore (Approximately 3 to 6 months). Training is paid.
Develop a thorough understanding of Keyence products and applications through classes, seminars, and on-the-job training.
Provide technical consultation and service to customers to help solve their applications using Keyence’s products in a variety of industries, selecting and promoting the proper company products/services for their application.
Demonstrate a high degree of flexibility in adapting to Keyence Singapore’s expectations and the challenges customers present you.
Respond promptly and efficiently to customer requests.
Secure new customers consistently and efficiently.
Travel to customer locations three days per week and successfully sell products/services into a wide variety of manufacturing & related industries.
Coordinate account strategy and contribute to territory’s strategic plan.
Successfully implement new product-launch strategies.
Deliver growth in market share within assigned sales territory.
Coordinate off-site seminars and trade shows as needed.
Manage day-to-day activities with little to no managerial supervision.
Understand and observe company / department policies and procedures.
Other duties or projects, as assigned

Requirements and Qualifications

Preferably Degree in engineering field. Candidates with a business related degree would also be considered
Interest and aptitude to master Keyence’s highly technical products.
Interest in working in manufacturing environments.
Excellent presentation, oral and written communication skills.
Ability to listen and pro-actively react to customer questions and requests.
Goal-oriented and extremely hard working with a desire to make a measurable contribution to Keyence Singapore’s success.
Desire to better yourself through our intensive training, mentorship, engaged management, and pro-active, process-oriented sales approach.
Understand and abide by all company policies and procedures: including professional dress code, punctuality, attendance, and sales process policies.
Willingness to travel 60% of the time, including the possibility of overnight travel.
Preferred to have VALID Class 3 Licence.

description:

This is a great opportunity to kick-start your career in the banking sector!

You should possess sound financial knowledge and provide holistic financial planning advice to customers. To identify suitable financial solutions offered by the bank to meet their financial goals.

You are expected to achieve a balanced scorecard set by the company.

title: Accounts Executive
description:
Career Description:
a) Work on accounting, corporate secretarial, tax and related assignments under the supervision of seniors, managers and partners, to ensure that these assignments are executed based on the relevant professional requirements;
b) Assist to prepare full set of management accounts and consolidated financial statements, business activity reports and forecasts for clients and other external stakeholders;
c) Perform financial accounting and corporate reporting activities;
d) Work as a team member by sharing responsibilities, providing support and maintaining communication with colleagues on an effective and efficient basis;
e) Use relevant Infocomm technology systems and tools effectively for data analysis; and
f) Develop and maintain professional relationships with clients.

Career Roles and Responsibilities:
As an accounts executive, your primary roles and responsibilities are set out below:

a) Liaising with clients to obtain supporting documents for the preparation of the management accounts.
b) Carry out specific accounting work allocated.
c) Identifying and highlight accounting issues.
d) Record and process all business transactions in the accounting system using double-entry accounting.
e) Ensure that accurate data are entered into the accounting system.
f) Process payroll transactions, if required.
g) Retrieve reports from the accounting system management or audit purposes.
h) Assist to prepare period-end management accounts such as profit or loss statement, statement of financial statements and relevant supporting schedules.
i) Drafting of unaudited financial statements.
j) Assist in accounting related administrative work, such as archiving of accounting files.
k) Keep abreast with professional standards when providing accounting services.

Requirements:

Diploma/Degree in Accountancy or a professional qualification under the ACCA, ICAEW and SCAQ schemes
Conversant and familiar with the Singapore Financial Reporting Standards and Company Act
Proactive, committed and a team player
Possess initiative and ability to work independently
Possess project management skills


Write in to us with your latest resume, expected salary and attach a recent photograph to hr@accvisory.com

title: Production Technician
description:
Responsibilities:

Operate cosmetics dispensing, mixing, filling, and packing machinery specified in manuals or procedures.
Oversee the daily operation of respective production requirements such as line productivity, efficiency, quality, yield, and machine utilization.
Report all incidents, near misses, and deviations from the procedure and take part in further investigation when required.
Carry out installation, assembly, servicing, repairing, and troubleshooting works on existing machines and equipment and new development projects.
Ensure line clearance is practiced for mix-up prevention.
Perform reconciliation, cleaning, and sanitation after production processes.

Knowledge of GMP will be an added advantage.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Able to support overtime and shift.
Able to work independently.

title: Electronic Test Support Technician
description:
Job Summary:
An Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) Test Support Technician is responsible for assisting in the planning, execution, and documentation of EMC tests to ensure that electronic and electrical products comply with electromagnetic compatibility standards. This role involves preparing test setups, operating test equipment, troubleshooting issues, and maintaining records, and assisting in EMC facility management.

Key Responsibilities:
Setup Preparation:

Assist in setting up EMC test environments, including test chambers, test equipment, and test fixtures.
Ensure all necessary components and connections are in place for accurate testing.


Execution:

Operate EMC test equipment such as spectrum analyzers, oscilloscopes, radiated and conducted emissions/receiver systems, and transient generators.
Monitor test procedures and make real-time adjustments to maintain test integrity.
Perform conducted and radiated emissions testing, susceptibility testing, and other EMC-related evaluations.
Conduct EMC tests in indoor facility.
Occasionally conduct EMC tests on site.

Troubleshooting:

Assist engineers and senior technicians to troubleshoot.

Documentation:

Prepare EMC test plans and test reports.
Maintain detailed records of test setups, procedures, and results.
Generate test reports that include test parameters, observations, and compliance status.

Facility management:

Assist in EMC facility management.
Perform routine maintenance, calibration, and calibration.


Qualifications

Diploma or equivalent in electronics, electrical engineering technology, or a related field.
Hands-on fresh graduates are welcome to apply.


Only Singapore Citizen may apply.

Salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.
Only shortlisted candidates will be notified for the next step.
Job Description:
Job Description: 
Assist in setting up EMC test environments, including test chambers, test equipment, and test fixtures.
Ensure all necessary components and connections are in place for accurate testing.

Job Requirements: 
Diploma or equivalent in electronics, electrical engineering technology, or a related field.
Hands-on fresh graduates are welcome to apply.

description:

Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.

Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm

Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)

Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

description:

Ensure the smooth running of the day to day operations in production line control with regards to inspection of line and checks on intermediate samples and finished product
Sample preparation and analysis of total sugar using HPLC
Participate in laboratory ICP, GLP and safety schemes in the laboratory
Participate in GMP audit or other audits in Production plant
Maintaining in good order (prepare for tasting and recordings) the product, keeping quality samples
Participate in the preparation of fresh samples for tasting and also the housekeeping
Preparation of Certificate of Analysis (COA) for customers
Participate in the daily DQR meeting

NITEC/Diploma in Food Science/ Microbiology/ Chemical Process Technology
Fresh Graduates are welcome
Rotating Shift work

title: Behaviour Interventionist (Disability Services)
description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION

Since October 2011, Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large.
THKMC provides assistance to the various groups in our community through more than 60 programmes and services for the elderly and the sick, families, persons with disabilities, and children.  We help anyone in need with full respect to their race, colour, creed, language, culture and religion. We have more than 90 programmes and services, reaching out to more than 55,000 people in the community.
Together, as ONE THKMC – Empowering the Community.

RESPONSIBILITIES

As a Behaviour Interventionist, you will assist and execute behaviour intervention plans for the residents. You are one of the first responders to residents with intellectual and/or other disabilities who exhibit challenging behaviours or experience emotional meltdowns. This role requires good communications skills and teamwork. You will work as part of a multi-disciplinary team in developing and carrying out Individual Care Plans (ICPs) of residents.
Responsibilities:
Provide behavioural knowledge services to the residential homes and day activity centres
Develop and review Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) of client care and management
Conduct research
Observe behavioural issues
Create and execute behaviour improvement plans
Monitor residents' progress
Keep statistical records
Skills & Competencies:
Behavioural assessment, formulation and intervention
Stakeholder management
Trends evaluation and application
Communication
Interpersonal Skills
Sense Making
Service Orientation

QUALIFICATIONS
Diploma in Psychology

OTHER INFORMATION
Comfortable with shift work
Work location available: Chai Chee


    Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities

Provide behavioural knowledge services to the residential homes and day activity centres
Develop and review Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) of client care and management
Conduct research

Create and execute behaviour improvement plans

Keep statistical records

Diploma in Psychology

title: Web Developer & Full-Stack Coding Intern
description:
Quick Apply: You may send your Resume/CV to recruitment@singaporetuitionteachers.com or apply via MyCareersFuture.
Office Location: 28 Sin Ming Lane, Midview City (Bright Hill/Marymount/Bishan MRT)
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:

MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture

Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:

Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.

Learning Outcomes & Objectives:

Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary

Requirements:

Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently

Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:

5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Why Choose Us:

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

Application:

Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:

1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application

location: east

description:
Job Description
Title : Associate Engineer,GIS
Role - Application Support
Experience: Freshers are welcome
Type - 1 Year direct Contract Renewable / Convertable
Skills - SQL Scripting

Responsibilities

Provide support for GIS and GIS-related applications, including data rectification, data synchronization, and incident resolution.
Monitor and respond to all system alerts and provide daily technical support in terms of troubleshooting, diagnosing, and resolving issues.
Perform incident investigation and resolution, root cause analysis, and problem resolution, ensuring high availability of applications users.
Perform any administrative tasks associated with GIS and GIS-related applications, such as user account management, log reviews, etc.
Monitor incident and problem tickets and provide appropriate resolutions on a timely basis.
Support all internal and external audits for GIS and GIS-related applications.
Adhere to standard IT service delivery processes in accordance with IT policies and procedures.
Document and update application configuration and architecture diagrams.
Perform any other related duties/tasks as assigned by the immediate supervisor or Director, Information Technology

Requirements

Diploma in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, or equivalent
Candidates with 0-2 years of related experience in GIS or GIS-related applications will be an added advantage.
Good skills with SQL and Perl scripting and PHP programming.
Possess excellent interpersonal skills, resourceful, analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills
Candidates with no relevant experience but with a good attitude and interest in GIS applications are welcome to apply, as on-the-job training will be provided.

title: Insurance Specialist (Banking) | CODE:GL
description:
Join Our Team as an Insurance Specialist

Position Overview:
As an Insurance Specialist, you will be a vital member of our team, working closely with Relationship Managers to provide expert guidance on protection plans and insurance products to our valued clients. Your role involves conducting training sessions for Relationship Managers, performing in-depth financial analyses, and tailoring personalized insurance solutions. Your commitment to delivering excellent customer service while ensuring strict regulatory compliance makes you an essential asset to our team.

Position Details:
Key Responsibilities:

Partner with Relationship Managers to provide protection plans and product advisory to clients.
Conduct product and insurance proposition training for Relationship Managers to enhance their product knowledge.
Perform comprehensive financial analysis for clients, customizing a set of products that align with their unique needs.
Offer product advisory services to clients, delivering an excellent customer service and banking experience.
Maintain rigorous compliance with all bank regulations and external regulatory authorities.

Qualifications:

A minimum of 2 years of insurance sales experience is preferred.
At least a Diploma or Degree qualification.

This is your opportunity to be a part of a team that provides expert insurance solutions and exceptional customer experiences. If you have the qualifications and drive to excel in this role, we encourage you to apply for the position of Insurance Specialist. Your expertise and dedication are valued assets that will help us achieve our mission of providing top-tier financial services to our clients.
Interested candidates can kindly apply via MyCareersFuture or drop your latest resume to gary.lua@justrecruit.com.sg
